name: Jelly Hunters
description:
This is the result of me playing with Unity and assets I have from the store. I have a grand plan for Jelly Hunters. None of that is in right now, it's a bare bones and terrible prototype. 

There is one demo included. Alt-F4 to quit, there's no real pause menu yet. 

Assets Used (This links contain affiliate links because why not)

  • Invector's Shooter Template
  • Meshtint's Polygon Aliens
  • SlimUI's 3D Modern Menu
  • Black Horizon Studios' Emerald AI
  • LMHPOLY's Low Poly Modular Terrain Pack
  • Synty Studios' POLYGON - Sci-Fi Space Pack
  • NeatWolf's ELEMENTALIS - 2018 Revamping (500+ FX Magic & Spells - MEGABundle 03)
